name: Attack of the Gigant Zombie vs Unity chan Demo
name_original: Attack of the Gigant Zombie vs Unity chan Demo
description:
Retro-styled 3D action game. Explore places, battle against monsters to be stronger, beat the boss monsters to obtain powerful attacks

Almost all the things found on the ground can be transported, to decorate your house

This is a trial version of "Attack of Gigant Zombie vs Unity chan"

In this demo version, you can experience the basic operation and game system

- You can play in the home, forest and desert area
- The stage conposition is different from the full version
- The story is not revealed
- The achievements are not available
- Save data is not shared with the full version

The full version is available on Steam
